properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 2:50AM EST until February 20 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft expected. For the
Gale Watch, north winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 7 to 10 ft possible.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Ocracoke Inlet to Surf City.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to
2 PM EST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon
through Friday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
